member.name: FILE_ID_DESCRIPTOR
member.summary: Specifies the type of ID that is being used.

summary.para: The discriminator for the union indicating the type of identifier that is being passed.

listheader.description: Use the FileId member of the union.
Use the ObjectId member of the union.

Use the ExtendedFileId member of the union.
Windows XP, Windows Server 2003, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2008, Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2: This value is not supported before Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012.

member.name: FILE_ID_DESCRIPTOR.DUMMYUNIONNAME.FileId
member.summary: The ID of the file to open.

member.name: FILE_ID_DESCRIPTOR.DUMMYUNIONNAME.ObjectId
member.summary: The ID of the object to open.

summary.para: A structure containing the 128-bit file ID of the file. This is used on ReFS file systems.
Windows XP, Windows Server 2003, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2008, Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2: This member is not supported before Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012.
